Proper typography is important throughou: Proper typography is important throughout elementary OS. Not just for consistency within the OS, but for following proper convention and presenting ourselves as a serious, professional platform.
Only use <strong>one space</strong> afte: Escriba únicamente un espacio después de un punto.
i.e. “This is a sentence. This is anothe: o sea: «Esta es una oración. Esta es otra oración.»
For quotes, use proper <strong>left and: For quotes, use proper left and right double quotation characters (“ and ”).
In contractions and possession, use a <s: In contractions and possession, use a right single quotation mark (’) as an apostrophe.
Use <strong>real math symbols</strong> f: Use real math symbols for subtraction (−), multiplication (×), and division (÷) signs.
Use correct <strong>copyright symbols</s: El uso correcto de los símbolos de copyright (©).
Use <strong>superscripts</strong> where: Añada letras voladas donde sean necesarias (p. ej., 1.er).
Use <code>\\u2010</code> in code. Used f: Utiliza \u2010 en el código. Usado para:
<em>If the word cannot be split along li: If the word cannot be split along lines (e.g. UTF-8), use a non-breaking hyphen (- \u2011).
Number ranges (e.g. 5–12). <em>Do not pu: Number ranges (e.g. 5–12). Do not put a space on either side.
Interjections (e.g. the party—which was: Interjections (e.g. the party—which was scheduled for Thursday—was delayed).
<em>Do not put a space on either side.</: Do not put a space on either side.
If in doubt, refer to <a href=\"http://p: If in doubt, refer to Butterwick's Practical Typography.
These rules apply to the English languag: Las reglas anteriores aplican al idioma inglés. Cada lengua utiliza sus propias normas que los traductores deberán seguir.
